meanings.definition: Absorbing or assimilating information or ideas gradually.
meanings.sent1: The students were osmosing the new concepts in class.
meanings.sent2: She was osmosing the details of the story as she read.
meanings.sent3: The book was so interesting that she found herself osmosing the plot effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a sponge, osmosing knowledge from every source.
meanings.sent5: The information was osmosing into her mind like water into a dry sponge.

meanings.definition: Gradually assimilating or blending into a different culture or environment.
meanings.sent1: The family was osmosing into the vibrant neighborhood seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: She was osmosing into the new workplace culture with ease.
meanings.sent3: The tourists were osmosing into the local customs with curiosity.
meanings.sent4: Their traditions were osmosing together, creating a beautiful fusion.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the painting were osmosing into each other, creating a harmonious blend.
